### [Day 2]{style="color:red;"}

#### **In Class**

- **Please bring a laptop to class**
- Exercise: Optimizing Sampling Allocation within Strata [Download Data](../classfiles552/ThompsonChapter11/N.fish.csv)
- These data are counts of fish per stream segment. Create a RMarkdown script to optimally allocated the samples among strata; you have to decide on the strata. Use a fixed total sample size of $n = 100$.

**The optimal n per strata**

$$
n_h = \frac{nN_h\sigma_h}{\sum_{k=1}^L N_k \sigma_k}
$$
